headline: Assessing Aon’s Value After Recent 7% Dip Amid Industry Uncertainty
summary: If you have been tracking Aon lately and feeling a bit uncertain about what the recent volatility means for your portfolio, you are not alone. With shares recently closing at $329.96 and a string of negative returns over the past week and month, it is natural to wonder whether this is a warning or an opportunity. In fact, while the stock is down 3.9% over the past 7 days and 7.0% year to date, what really stands out is its impressive 5-year gain of more than 90%. This result highlights Aon’s...
